segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 4
18. Sañcetaniyavagga
172. Vibhattisutta
Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
“āvuso bhikkhave”ti.
“Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
Āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:
“Addhamāsūpasampannena me, āvuso, atthapaṭisambhidā sacchikatā odhiso byañjanaso.
segments.en: “Reverends, I realized the textual analysis of the meaning—piece by piece and expression by expression—a fortnight after I ordained.

segments.pli: Tamahaṃ anekapariyāyena ācikkhāmi desemi paññāpemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi.
segments.en: In many ways I explain, teach, assert, establish, clarify, analyze, and reveal it.

segments.pli: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, so maṃ pañhena.
segments.en: Whoever has any doubt or uncertainty, let them ask me,

segments.pli: Ahaṃ veyyākaraṇena sammukhībhūto no satthā yo no dhammānaṃ sukusalo.
segments.en: I will answer. Our teacher is present, he who is so very skilled in our teachings.

segments.pli: Addhamāsūpasampannena me, āvuso, dhammapaṭisambhidā sacchikatā odhiso byañjanaso.
segments.en: I realized the textual analysis of the text—piece by piece and expression by expression—a fortnight after I ordained. …

segments.pli: Tamahaṃ anekapariyāyena ācikkhāmi desemi paññāpemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi.
Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, so maṃ pañhena.
Ahaṃ veyyākaraṇena sammukhībhūto no satthā yo no dhammānaṃ sukusalo.
Addhamāsūpasampannena me, āvuso, niruttipaṭisambhidā sacchikatā odhiso byañjanaso.
segments.en: I realized the textual analysis of terminology—piece by piece and expression by expression—a fortnight after I ordained. …

segments.pli: Tamahaṃ anekapariyāyena ācikkhāmi desemi paññāpemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi.
Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, so maṃ pañhena.
Ahaṃ veyyākaraṇena sammukhībhūto no satthā yo no dhammānaṃ sukusalo.
Addhamāsūpasampannena me, āvuso, paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā sacchikatā odhiso byañjanaso.
segments.en: I realized the textual analysis of eloquence—piece by piece and expression by expression—a fortnight after I ordained.

segments.pli: Tamahaṃ anekapariyāyena ācikkhāmi desemi paññāpemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi.
segments.en: In many ways I explain, teach, assert, establish, clarify, analyze, and reveal it.

segments.pli: Yassa kho panassa kaṅkhā vā vimati vā, so maṃ pañhena.
segments.en: If anyone has any doubt or uncertainty, let them ask me,

segments.pli: Ahaṃ veyyākaraṇena sammukhībhūto no satthā yo no dhammānaṃ sukusalo”ti.
segments.en: I will answer. Our teacher is present, he who is so very skilled in our teachings.”

segments.pli: Dutiyaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: Sāriputta realized the four kinds of textual analysis a fortnight after he ordained.
